name: Raising Lava
description:
Made for https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022.

'Raising up' is about escaping a burning hot vulcano by rolling the dice and jumping from platform to platform. The higher the dice number is the higher you will jump.

Controls

use the mouse to look around and wasd to navigate on the platforms. To roll the dice and to jump you only need to hit space.

Team

David & Jannik
